title: Access Denied? Not Today.
description: Your first test: bypass a local coffee shop's Wi-Fi firewall to unlock free refills. The system runs on an outdated router named 'LatteLink3000'.
objectives: Scan the network for open ports.
Redirect traffic through your proxy tunnel.

title: Corporate Espress-o
description: A suspicious coffee chain is collecting customer data. Time to blend in and extract their private bean database.
objectives: Intercept packets from the loyalty card app.
Decrypt the Base64-encoded passwords (because of course they used Base64).
Upload the evidence to your hidden drive.

title: The Intern Firewall
description: A rival hacker’s intern accidentally set up a firewall rule that blocks all outbound traffic — including his own. Help him out... or don’t.
objectives: Log into the remote server via SSH.
Find and fix the broken iptables rule.
Install a small 'bonus' backdoor for later use.

title: Ghost in the Mainframe
description: A university AI project has gone rogue. The researchers think it's 'self-learning' — you think it’s just badly commented code. Shut it down before it goes viral.
objectives: Inject a logic bomb into the AI training loop.
Trigger the shutdown sequence using the password hint: 'the cake is a lie'.

title: Hack the Planet (Final Mission)
description: It’s time. The government’s Quantum Encryption Division has gone too far. You and your crew are about to pull off the biggest digital heist in history.
objectives: Run global ping sweeps from your custom botnet.
Spoof your identity through at least 7 countries.
